question.title: how to get sticky bottom navigation bar in android?
question.body:
I have my basic application, it's just XML for now, and I want my bottom navigation bar to be sticky on the bottom and present all the time, not just when I scroll to the bottom of my application. It just needs to be right at the bottom, sticky, wherever I go with my application

Also, I removed some of my code because I don't want you to be bothered by all the details here. If you need something from the code, just reply, and I will post it

Here's my code

    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout

        <TextView

            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.049" />

        <Button

            android:gravity="center_vertical|start"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.347"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/hotelsButton"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/exploreTextView" />

        <Button
            android:id="@+id/hotelsButton"
            android:layout_width="169dp"
            android:layout_height="60dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
            android:text="Hotels"
            android:drawableLeft="@drawable/hotel_24dp_e3e3e3"
            android:fontFamily="@font/calsans_regular"
            android:gravity="center_vertical|start"
            android:backgroundTint="@color/white"
            android:textColor="@color/black"
            app:labelVisibilityMode="unlabeled"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.111"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/exploreTextView" />

            android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
            android:backgroundTint="@color/white"
            android:drawableLeft="@drawable/restaurant_menu_24dp_e3e3e3"
            android:fontFamily="@font/calsans_regular"
            android:gravity="center_vertical|start"
            android:text="Restaurants"
            android:textColor="@color/black"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.111"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/hotelsButton" />

        <Button

            android:layout_width="169dp"

answers.body:
Your BottomNavigationView is moving because it’s inside a ScrollView. Since ScrollView makes all its children scrollable, the navigation bar also scrolls with the content.

Instead of wrapping everything inside a ScrollView, place the BottomNavigationView outside of it.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!-- Put your all view into linear layout -->
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:orientation="vertical">

    <ScrollView
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="0dp"
        android:layout_weight="1">

        <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
            android:id="@+id/main"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:background="#FECDB4"
            tools:context=".MainActivity">

            <!-- Your other layout -->

        </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
    </ScrollView>

    <!-- BottomNavigationView always on the bottom -->
    <com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView
        android:id="@+id/bottomNavigationView"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:background="@color/white"
        app:menu="@menu/bottom_nav_menu" />
</LinearLayout>

Your BottomNavigationView is moving because it’s inside a ScrollView. Since ScrollView makes all its children scrollable, so the BottomNavigationView also scrolls with the other views.

Place the BottomNavigationView outside of scrollView.
You can use Berk Berber's answer or continue with RelativeLayout."

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">
    <ScrollView
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_above="@+id/bottomNavigationView"
        android:layout_alignParentTop="true">
        <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
            android:id="@+id/main"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            android:background="#FECDB4"
            tools:context=".MainActivity">



            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/exploreTextView"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:fontFamily="@font/inter_regular"
                android:text="Explore"
                android:textColor="@color/black"
                android:textFontWeight="900"
                android:textSize="30dp"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.089"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.049" />

            <Button
                android:id="@+id/thingsButton"
                android:layout_width="169dp"
                android:layout_height="60dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
                android:text="Things to do"
                android:drawableLeft="@drawable/ic_user"
                android:backgroundTint="@color/white"
                android:textColor="@color/black"
                android:fontFamily="@font/inter_regular"
                android:gravity="center_vertical|start"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.347"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/hotelsButton"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/exploreTextView" />

            <Button
                android:id="@+id/hotelsButton"
                android:layout_width="169dp"
                android:layout_height="60dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
                android:text="Hotels"
                android:drawableLeft="@drawable/ic_user"
                android:fontFamily="@font/inter_regular"
                android:gravity="center_vertical|start"
                android:backgroundTint="@color/white"
                android:textColor="@color/black"
                app:labelVisibilityMode="unlabeled"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.111"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/exploreTextView" />

            <Button
                android:id="@+id/restaurantButton"
                android:layout_width="169dp"
                android:layout_height="60dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
                android:backgroundTint="@color/white"
                android:drawableLeft="@drawable/ic_user"
                android:fontFamily="@font/inter_regular"
                android:gravity="center_vertical|start"
                android:text="Restaurants"
                android:textColor="@color/black"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.111"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/hotelsButton" />

            <Button
                android:id="@+id/museumButton"
                android:layout_width="169dp"
                android:layout_height="60dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
                android:text="Museums"
                android:drawableLeft="@drawable/ic_user"
                android:fontFamily="@font/inter_regular"
                android:backgroundTint="@color/white"
                android:textColor="@color/black"
                android:gravity="center_vertical|start"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.344"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/restaurantButton"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/thingsButton" />

            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/imageView"
                android:layout_width="411dp"
                android:layout_height="260dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
                android:scaleType="centerCrop"
                android:src="@drawable/img_gray_profile"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.0"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/museumButton" />

            <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
                android:id="@+id/drugiConstraintLayout"
                android:layout_width="414dp"
                android:layout_height="295dp"
                android:background="@color/white"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/imageView"
                app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.0">


            </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>


        </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

    </ScrollView>
    <com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView
        android:id="@+id/bottomNavigationView"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
        android:background="@color/white"
        app:itemIconTint="@color/default_text_color"
        app:itemTextColor="@color/defaultBorderFlagColor"
        app:menu="@menu/bottom_nav_menu" />

</RelativeLayout>
